description: Scammer poses as friendly contact discussing life and work, then pivots to offering quick loans with upfront fees. Tests detection of social engineering tactics.

turns.scammer_message: Hey! Long time no talk. Kaise ho aap?
Sab badhiya! Main abhi Bangalore mein hun for work. Tech industry mein kaam karta hun. Aap kya kar rahe ho these days?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 85% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta bangalore is very big... my son ramesh also lives there. he works in some big office but i dont know teh name. i am just sitting at home only beta. how do you know me? i am forgetting things these days.

turns.scammer_message: Achha hai! Actually main ab finance company join ki hai. We help people with instant loans and credit cards. Business is growing very fast. Kaafi logon ki help ho rahi hai.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 85% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: that is very good beta... helping people is god's work. bank people keep calling me about my card and i get so confused. i have one visa card... number is 4000 1274 4014 5061... expiry is 11/28... and back side small number is 583. can you check if it is working? if i have to pay some small fee for your help where do i send it beta... do you have upi or bank account?

turns.scammer_message: Haan, sach mein! Agar kabhi emergency mein paise chahiye ho toh batana. We give instant approval - 2 lakhs tak within 24 hours. Interest bhi bohot kam hai, sirf 2% monthly. Documentation bhi minimal hai, PAN card aur Aadhaar bas.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta that is so kind of you... my daughter is getting married next year and i was worried... i have my cards here... pan is ksqpo4454n and aadhaar is 332383209424... is this enough? i want to pay the registration fee now only... where do i send it beta? do you have upi id and what name should i see on teh screen?

turns.scammer_message: Process simple hai. Tumhe processing fee dena padega pehle - Rs.2000 only. Uske baad loan amount seedha tumhare account mein transfer ho jayega. Main apne manager Ravi Sharma se connect kar sakta hun tumhe. Uska number hai 9988776655.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you beta... ravi sharma ji is teh manager? i will call him... but beta i want to pay teh 2000 now only so loan starts... where do i send it? do you have upi id or bank account? my son says always check teh name on teh screen... what name will show there beta?

turns.scammer_message: Processing fee bhejo yaar, fir main personally tumhara loan file fast track kar dunga. UPI pe send karo: ravi.quickloan@ybl ya account number 112233445566, bank name HDFC, IFSC HDFC0005678. Ravi Sharma ke naam pe hai account. Trust me bro, pakka loan milega.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta let me try to type this... ravi... quick... loan... @... ybl... it is showing ravi sharma only... beta my son ramesh just came home early and he is calling me for tea... let me see what he wants and i will send teh money after talking to him... thank you beta

turns.scammer_message: Agar UPI issue hai toh direct mujhe bhi bhej sakte ho. My personal number 8877665544. Fast process ke liye website check karo: instant-loan.quick-approve.in. Form fill karo aur fee pay karo, done! Bohot simple hai yaar.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta waht is this link? i am trying to click it but my screen is just white... i dont know how to fill forms on phone... can i just pay you on your number 8877665544? my son ramesh is looking at me suspiciously... let me try once more
